resources.string:
Ice is developed by aegamesi; (Steam).
The source code of Ice can be found on GitHub.

Ice would not be possible without these projects: SteamKit, SteamKit-Java, and SteamTrade-Java.

German translation courtesy Alex Westphal
Korean translation courtesy Flowaria
Russian translation courtesy Nikita Sychev
Chinese translation courtesy Beeflot
Turkish translation courtesy Arda Cn.
Czech translation courtesy WaRToNofficial.

If you like Ice,
Please rate it on Google Play!

Donations are always welcome, too! :)
